function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Simulation models may not accurately represent the real-world behavior of contagious diseases","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of digital twin technology for digitalization of vaccination process","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential inefficiencies in the real service process","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliability of virtual model","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vulnerabilities in the built environment","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerabilities in the control environment","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in office environments increases the risk of airborne virus transmission due to the presence of micro respiratory droplets.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Office buildings were not designed with sufficient consideration for infectious disease control, leading to an increased risk of viral spread within the workplace.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective air cleaning, filtration, and ventilation systems","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor air quality and increased risk of virus spaces","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerabilities in building design and infrastructure that allow for the spread of contagious diseases like covid-19","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obsolete office surveillance systems","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Surfaces retaining viruses can become frequent touch points","category":"Soil","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Microbiological contaminants in water tanks during building closures","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of infection from contaminated office surfaces","category":"Soil","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for efficient airflow and room sanitation","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in workplaces leading to the spread of covid-19","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding in open office layouts facilitating viral transmission","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-speed elevators in multistory office buildings becoming places of high
